      • getSentenceBoundaries

        Set<Integer> getSentenceBoundaries()

      • getDetectedSentences

        List<Sentence> getDetectedSentences(Sentence leftOverText)
        Based on the sentence boundaries added, return all the sentences produced by this sentence holder. If there is any text left over, the last sentence will be marked as not complete. After this is called, Sentence.getOriginalTextSegments() will only return leftover original text segments that have not yet been assigned to sentences in the current list.
        Parameters:
        leftOverText - an incomplete sentence returned by the previous sentence holder.
        Returns:
